channel.title: In memoriam: Langston Hughes
channel.description:
A series about the noted American poet who died May 22, 1967. It features him reading his poetry at Columbia University during Spring 1964.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of a tribute to poet Langston Hughes.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature

item.title: Part two
item.description: This program presents the second part of a tribute to poet Langston Hughes.
item.dc:creator: WRVR (Radio station : New York, N.Y.)
item.dc:subject: U.S. Literature
